tool_description: StockCrypto  is a powerful and user-friendly API that offers comprehensive stock market data and cryptocurrency information. With this API, developers can access real-time and historical data for stocks, including price data, financials, news articles, and analyst recommendations. Additionally, it provides detailed insights into various cryptocurrencies, including price history, news updates, and market statistics. Whether you're building a financial application, conducting market analysis, o...
name: StockCrypto
title: StockCrypto

api_list.name: getCryptoConversionRates

optional_parameters.name: exchange
optional_parameters.description: Provide a valid exchange from getCryptoExchanges endpoint. Note: If none is provided Binanceus will be used as default

api_list.name: getCryptoExchanges
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://stockcrypto.p.rapidapi.com/get_Crypto_Exchanges"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "stockcrypto.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://stockcrypto.p.rapidapi.com/get_Crypto_Exchanges"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "stockcrypto.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: getCryptoMarketOverview

optional_parameters.name: exchange
optional_parameters.description: Provide a valid exchange from getCryptoExchanges endpoint. Note: If none is provided Binanceus  will be used as default

api_list.name: getCryptoHistoricalData

required_parameters.name: period
required_parameters.description:
valid entries are: 
'1m': 1 minute
'5m': 5 minutes
'15m': 15 minutes
'30m': 30 minutes
'1h': 1 hour
'4h': 4 hours
'1d': 1 day
'1w': 1 week
'1M': 1 month

optional_parameters.name: exchange
optional_parameters.description: Provide a valid exchange from getCryptoExchanges endpoint. Note: If none is provided Binanceus will be used as default

api_list.name: getCryptoQuote

optional_parameters.name: exchange
optional_parameters.description: Provide a valid exchange from getCryptoExchanges endpoint. Note: If none is provided binanceus will be used as default

api_list.name: getStockNews
api_list.description: get news of a particular ticker eg AAPL

api_list.name: getStockHistoricalData

required_parameters.name: period
required_parameters.description:
valid entries are:
'1d': 1 day
'5d': 5 days
'1mo': 1 month
'3mo': 3 months
'6mo': 6 months
'1y': 1 year
'2y': 2 years
'5y': 5 years
'10y': 10 years
'ytd': Year-to-date->starting from the beginning of the current year up to the present date.
'max': Maximum available historical data
